name: AnswersLab
short_description:
Answerslab is a social networking web service launched for professionals. It’s an information network, Answerlab essentially used for professional’s collaboration. 
A User can post profession related question’s and also answer’s in this site.
User of this site may create a personal profile and follow other professional and update their profile with their new profession. Answerslab connects professionals, with user’s interests and profession.  Also invite their friends
Answerslab Users can share their doubts with other professionals in real-time and builds relationship with other related professional’s and also follow questions and answers may ask friends network with Ask your Friends button. Also like the question and answer
 The site is available in English language, Sign in via Facebook.
summary: Ask a Question - Collabrate with other Professionals
